title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 52.9 - Employees to remain with inmates
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 52.9 - Employees to remain with inmates

State Regulations

Employees accompanying inmates out of the institution shall
remain with them until they are turned over to another authorized
employee. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
52.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
